Issue.creator: ashutosh_kumar
Issue.summary: npm audit Regular Expression Denial of Service Vulnerability(package timespan)
Issue.description: loggly > timespan │ ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/533 Proposed fix is : *npm install --save-dev log4js@4.4.0* *SEMVER WARNING: Recommended action is a potentially breaking change* >
